page.title: 18MUTHILL GALA WEEK.
page.content: After an open air service on Sunday, the week comprises the following. {Football, Badminton,Darts contests.} Shields given by Community Council. {Tug of War.}12 a side, medals for winners.{Concert.Disco.Car Treasure {Hunt.}- evening functions.{ {Fancy Dress Parade.}Led by Strathearn Pipe Band through village to Coronation Park, judged in age groups. {Gala Day.}Park set out with various stalls.Competitions are-{Welly Boot {Throwing}(part of National Contest sponsored by Bell's Whisky). {Races {for children, Obstacle Course, Pony {Rides, Bowling to a Target}(formed of concentric circles),{Tossing the Sheaf {competition. }This year there is a { {Picture and Story competition }for Primary School children. The Community Council organises the week, which is well supported by locals and visitors.
